blogs.title: Programming
blogs.desc: A programming language is a system of notation for writing computer programs. Most programming languages are text-based formal languages

blogs.title: Nature
blogs.desc: Nature, in the broadest sense, is the physical world or universe. Nature can refer to the phenomena of the physical world, and also to life in general.

blogs.title: Books
blogs.desc: A book is a medium for recording information in the form of writing or images, typically composed of many pages bound together and protected by a cover.
